metadata.description: 「ScProfile」とは、Scratchアカウントのプロフィール作成サービスです。Scratchアカウントと連携することで利用することが可能です。

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This shows how you appear to other users on the site.

toast.success: Changes saved successfully. It may take some time to reflect.

display_name.label: Display Name
display_name.description: This item is the display name of your ScProfile account.

validation.min2: String must contain at least 2 character(s)
validation.max10: String must contain at most 10 character(s)

toast.success: Account deleted. Changes may take some time to reflect.

0.title: Is it free to use?
0.content: Yes, this service is completely free to use.

1.title: Do I need to be a Scratcher?
1.content: No, both New Scratcher and Scratcher users can use it without any issues.

2.title: Can I make my profile private?
2.content: This feature is not available on the Hobby plan. Upgrading to the Pro plan will enable this feature.

feature.title: Create Your Profile Easily
feature.description: ScProfile is a profile creation service for Scratch users. By simply linking your Scratch account, you can easily create your own profile page.

0.name: Easy Registration with Scratch Account
0.description: With ScProfile, you can create your profile page by simply linking your Scratch account. No need to create a new account.

1.name: Fully Customizable
1.description: You can change the design and background of your profile to create a unique page just for you. More customization options will be added in the future.

2.name: Easily Showcase Your Scratch Projects
2.description: You can display the projects you've created on Scratch on your profile page, allowing visitors to see them instantly.

hero.headline: Your personal profile page for Scratch users
hero.description: A service that allows Scratch users to easily create their own profile page. You can link your Scratch account and display activity information, introductions, and created projects. It also offers customization features to create a more attractive profile page.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that's perfect for you, packed with customization features at an affordable price.

hobby.name: Hobby
hobby.description: The perfect plan for those using the service for the first time.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: The best plan for those who want to customize their profile to the fullest.

team.title: The Service Operations Team
team.description: We are a group or individuals who are passionate about our work and dedicated to delivering the best results for our clients.
